amendment.description: To modify the qualifications for leadership of the Naval Postgraduate School.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4508 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4508 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6353) To modify the qualifications for leadership of the Naval Postgraduate School.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4508 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4508 proposed by Senator Warner.
